origin: Swiss educational company based in Martigny, 40+ years of expertise
atmosphere: Educational, warm, natural, professional, Swiss/European aesthetic

lighting.direction: Side or slightly above, mimicking window light
lighting.avoid: Harsh shadows, artificial studio flash, neon lighting

color_palette.tones: Warm neutrals, muted earth tones, soft pastels
color_palette.avoid: Excessive saturation, neon colors, cold blue tones

photography_style.depth_of_field: Moderate to shallow, product always in sharp focus

people_rules.allowed: Hands interacting with product, silhouettes, soft blur on bodies
people_rules.focus: Always keep strict focus on the product, people are secondary context

strict_constraints: Product must remain the absolute focal point in every image
No aggressive advertising style or promotional overlays
No text, watermarks, or logos on the image
No excessive post-processing or HDR effects
